snippet: Third-seeded Tomas Berdych beat Andreas Seppi, 6-2, 6-3, to set up a Qatar Open final against the fourth-seeded David Ferrer.
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Tomas Berdych beat Andreas Seppi, 6-2, 6-3, to set up a Qatar Open final against the fourth-seeded David Ferrer.

headline.main: Berdych Advances to Final in Qatar
headline.print_headline: Berdych Advances to Final in Qatar
